scripts.bundle: rm -rf lib/* && bun build src/index.ts --target node --bundle --loader .php:text --loader .sh:text --minify --outfile lib/ainx_.js && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > lib/ainx.js && echo "if (parseInt(process.versions.node.split('.')[0]) < 16) {console.error('Node version '+process.versions.node+' is not supported, please use Node.js 16 or higher.');process.exit(1);};" >> lib/ainx.js && cat lib/ainx_.js >> lib/ainx.js && rm lib/ainx_.js
